title: Anyone having lag/high ping the last few days?
body:
This past few days I've been trying to play but i'm getting very high lag spikes, usually I get 70-80 ping but over the last few days it goes from 110 to 530 ping

I can play fine with 100-120 ping but those 400-500 spikes are just impossible to play with, even in bot games.

Anyone having the same problem?  I just wanna play League :(

replies.body:
Changes in latency (ping) are an indication that something either locally or along your route is causing your connection to take a longer path to the servers. I suggest working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are A-Okay.

Let me know if those steps helped your latency.
